name: A very boring story about a very boring cube going in very boring holes.
name_original: A very boring story about a very boring cube going in very boring holes.
description:
Very black and white instructions: 1. Put the cube in the hole, 2. Don't not put the cube in the hole. 

Submission for Brackeys 2020.1 Game Jam that I didn't have optimal time to participate in. Still a fun challenge.
